price: 110 qui cherche à nous chasser de notre pays ! Que proposez-vous ? »
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
